name: Sri Keshava Trust

address: c/o Vittala International Institute of Ophthalmology

briefDescription: Sri Keshava Trust is a “Sustainable Charity” engaged in provision of eye care services primarily in the Southern Indian State of Karnataka.The Trust has its activities in clinical work, out reach programs and in research.No patient is turned away for economic reasons and no effort is stinted to be at the cutting edge of eye care in all spheres.The trust undertakes research and training in all areas of ophthalmology and is currently in the process of creating comprehensive care models.  The trust has built, VIIO,   a Rs.20 Crore (3.5 Million USD) super specialty charitable Ophthalmic Hospital and research center, with the help of over 3500 donors big and small. The institute focuses on clinical work, Research and Training as its core area.
